content:
We are working with Vonk in local mode. However, there is any guideline to deploy this server -for instance, in Microsoft Portal Azure?
It might be great to hear some tips from experts on this forum.
Thanks in advance for your support.

We run vonk.fire.ly on Azure. Currently on a VM, moving to a Web App Service. We could add documentation about that in http://docs.simplifier.net/vonk.
I also think @Brian Reinhold ran his facade in Azure last WGM.

Hi Christiaan,
We finally got our Vonk Server deployed in Microsoft Portal Azure.
Now, we are including a couple of new profiles to personalize our Efferent eVue.
We will get you back if we have some doubts. Thanks!
